description: Ms. codex. Title of text 1 from leaf 1a; title of text 2 from colophon on leaf 258a. Manuscript erroneously foliated beginning on the front flyleaf. Record follows erroneous foliation. Physical description: 22 lines per page; written in neat naskh in black on glazed, laid Arabic paper. Rubrication and catchwords. Marginal damp-staining and extensive repairs, resulting in some loss of text on a number of leaves in the last quarter of the manuscript. Origin: End of Shaʻbān to Ramaḍān 1119 H [November-December 1707] (leaves 242a, 258a).
author: Ibn Bābawayh al-Qummī, Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī, 918 or 919-991 or 992
contents: 1. leaves 2b-242a: al-Mujallad al-thānī min Man lā yaḥḍuruhu al-faqīh. Second volume of a collection of ḥadīths addressing legal matters; contains Bāb al-qadāyā to the end.
2. leaves 242b-258a: Asānīd Man lā yaḥḍuruhu al-faqīh. Author's explanation of his authorities and chains of transmission; also known as Mashyakhat Man lā yaḥḍuruhu al-faqīh.
extent: 257 leaves : paper ; 254 x 185 (184 x 113) mm bound to 260 x 185 mm

title.@value: المجلد الثاني من كتاب من لا يحضره الفقيه. اسانيد من لا يحضره الفقيه
al-Mujallad al-thānī min Kitāb Man lā yaḥḍuruhu al-faqīh. Asānīd Man lā yaḥḍuruhu al-faqīh

provenance: Note of sale on leaf 1a. Two notes of legal compensation [al-ʻiwaḍ al-sharʻī] accompanied by owners' stamps on leaf 2a.
creator: Ibn Bābawayh al-Qummī, Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī, 918 or 919-991 or 992
ابن بابويه القمي، محمد بن علي، 918 or 919-991 or 992
subject: Ibn Bābawayh al-Qummī, Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī, 918 or 919-991 or 992—Man lā yaḥḍuruhu al-faqīh.
binding_note: Full black leather with blind-stamped central mandorla, pendants, and fillets.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
